text:
Tangan Gyuvin sekarang berpindah, melingkari leher Gunwook saat yang lebih muda mulai melisik lidah nya kedalam. Menjelajah deretan gigi yang tersusun rapi.
"Mhh–nhh" Gyuvin hampir kehilangan nafas saat Gunwook pegang tengkuk nya, dan memperdalam ciuman mereka. Hangat dari lidah yang bergelut, saling beradu melilit satu sama lain.
Gunwook ulas kan senyum nya, saat Gyuvin mendorong dada yang lebih muda karena kehilangan nafas. "Cantik." Gunwook usap belahan bibir bawah Gyuvin dengan lembut menggunakan jempol nya–terlihat rona merah menghiasi pipi pucat Gyuvin.
"Kamu tau kan, kak. Pada akhirnya cowok garang ini bisa jadi cantik sama manis, kalau aku buat berantakan. Bener kan?"
Padahal Gyuvin adalah orang yang biasa terlibat dalam perlawanan dan tawuran dengan sekolah lain, selalu siap untuk bertindak dan melawan. Namun, kini Gyuvin hanya bisa diam, tidak berdaya di hadapan Gunwook.
Saat ini, Gyuvin pasrah saat dimana Gunwook, yang lebih muda mendorongnya ke arah kasur. Saat Gyuvin terbaring di kasur, mereka saling bertatapan, menatap Gunwook kembali seperti waktu itu—𝘴𝘢𝘢𝘵 𝘬𝘦𝘱𝘦𝘳𝘢𝘸𝘢𝘯𝘢𝘯 𝘯𝘺𝘢 𝘩𝘪𝘭𝘢𝘯𝘨.
trans:
Gyuvin now moved his hand to wrap it around Gunwook's neck as the younger one pushed his tongue in, exploring the neatly aligned teeth.
"Mhh–nhh" Gyuvin almost lost his breath as Gunwook held the back of his neck, deepening their kiss. The warmth of their tongues intertwined and moved against each other.
Gunwook smiled as Gyuvin pushed against the younger one's chest, out of breath. "Beautiful," Gunwook softly brushed Gyuvin's lower lip with his thumb - there was a red blush spreading across Gyuvin's pale cheeks.
"You know, don't you, bro? In the end, this fierce guy can turn beautiful and sweet when I make him a mess, right?"
Even though Gyuvin was the kind of person who was often involved in fights and brawls with other schools, always ready to act and retaliate, now Gyuvin could only remain silent, powerless in front of Gunwook.
At this moment, Gyuvin surrendered as Gunwook, the younger one, pushed him toward the bed. As Gyuvin lay on the bed, they stared at each other, Gyuvin looking back at Gunwook just like back then - when he lost his virginity.
